projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce solution built with Angular and Node.js, featuring real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and advanced analytics dashboard.
projects.longDescription: This full-stack e-commerce platform demonstrates modern web development practices with a focus on performance, security, and user experience. The application includes features like product catalog management, shopping cart functionality, order processing, and administrative tools.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and advanced project tracking capabilities.
projects.longDescription: A sophisticated project management tool designed for modern teams. Features include kanban boards, time tracking, team collaboration, file sharing, and comprehensive reporting tools.

projects.title: Weather Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Beautiful weather dashboard with interactive charts, forecasts, and location-based weather data visualization.
projects.longDescription: An advanced weather application that provides detailed meteorological data with beautiful visualizations. Features include historical data analysis, weather alerts, and customizable dashboard widgets.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with Angular and TailwindCSS, featuring dark/light theme switching and internationalization.
projects.longDescription: A professional portfolio website showcasing modern web development techniques. Built with performance and accessibility in mind, featuring smooth animations and responsive design.
